name: Defenestration - AGBIC Jam Entry
description:
Defenestration is a game created for the 2016 "A Game By Its Cover" Jam.

It is based on this artwork by Elliott Gray for the 2016 My Famicase Exhibition: http://famicase.com/16/softs/40.html

In Defenestration two players try to throw each other out of a high-rise office building. Actions are queued up and then resolved in a rock-paper-scissors like fashion.

Controls (WASD for Player 1, Arrow Keys for Player 2:

  • A/D/Left/Right: Charge (beats Uppercut)
  • S/Down: Counter (beats Charge)
  • W/Up: Uppercut (beats Counter)
